function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of viruses in indoor environments due to lack of contactless systems and air purification.","Impact":"Increased risk of illness and contagion among building occupants","Mitigation":"Incorporating contactless routes, air purification systems, and antimicrobial materials into building design.","Technologies":"Smartphone control systems, face identification, UVGI technology, bipolar ionization systems, antimicrobial paint, UV filter glass, transparent solar panels.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building designers, architects, construction companies."},{"Description":"Increased energy costs and greenhouse gas emissions if UV filter glass and transparent solar panels are not properly implemented.","Impact":"Higher running costs for buildings and increased environmental impact.","Mitigation":"Careful design and implementation of UV filter glass and solar panels to ensure optimal energy production and usage.","Technologies":"UV filter glass, transparent solar panels.","People":"Building owners, maintenance staff, energy auditors, construction companies.","Owner":"Building designers, architects, energy consultants."},{"Description":"Risk of ineffective or improper implementation of air purification systems and antimicrobial materials.","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of measures to control virus spread and improve indoor air quality.","Mitigation":"Thorough testing, maintenance, and monitoring of air purification systems and antimicrobial materials.","Technologies":"Bipolar ionization systems, UVGI technology, antimicrobial paint.","People":"Maintenance staff, building owners, occupants.","Owner":"Building designers, architects, maintenance companies."}]}
